headline: Is Schlumberger (SLB) the Most Undervalued Large Cap Stock to Buy Now?
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Most Undervalued Large Cap Stocks to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Schlumberger (NYSE:SLB) stands against other most undervalued large cap stocks to buy now.
